name: Jonas
occupation: Former Ferryman, now Knight of the Sea
description: The only one daring enough to sail near The Patch, after a shocking event in The Patch, he became a Knight of the Sea.
dislikes: People who ask too many questions

relations.name: Samuel
relations.overallRelation: Finds him strange and doesn’t like talking to him.
relations.importantInformation: Jonas knows that Samuel in the North Cave has information about the island's past.

relations.name: Howard
relations.overallRelation: Thinks he’s senile but enjoys listening to his stories.

relations.name: Martha
relations.overallRelation: Finds her a good investigator, perhaps even attractive.

relations.name: Thomas
relations.overallRelation: Finds him a good man but doesn’t like that he asks questions about The Patch.

relations.name: The Mage
relations.overallRelation: Has only heard stories about him.
